main event: A UFO was observed in the sky over Cape Vincent, New York for approximately 4 hours on March 23, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as a ball of fire with an orange border,The object appeared to hang in the sky at a low altitude,Observers reported seeing the object move towards the north,It was confirmed by at least three people,Visual observations were made during overcast weather conditions.
sighted object: unidentified flying object resembling a ball of fire
witness description: Civilians, including at least one U.S. Air Force Officer
